problem_text_cn: 如图,在△ABC中,D为AB边上一点,DE∥BC交AC于点E,若\frac{AD}{DB}=\frac{3}{5},AE=6,则EC的长为()
problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, in △ABC, D is a point on the edge of AB, DE ∥ BC intersects AC at point E, if \frac{AD}{DB}=\frac{N_0}{N_1},AE=N_2, then the length of EC is ()
raw_comment: 此题主要考查了平行线分线段成比例定理,关键是掌握平行于三角形一边的直线截其他两边(或两边的延长线),所得的对应线段成比例．
